org.mule.modules.keycloak.client

Class KeycloakClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.keycloak.client.KeycloakClient

  • public class KeycloakClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The KeycloakClient is used to access the services for the different keycloak admin api calls.
    Author:
    Moritz MÃ¶ller, AOE GmbH

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        public java.lang.String createUser(java.lang.String jsonString)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   UserAlreadyExistsException,
                                   CreateUserException,
                                   UserNotFoundException
        Calls the user service to create a user by its json representation. If credentials are provided too, the user service is called a second time to activate the user with the submitted credentials
        Parameters:
        jsonString - User representation
        Returns:
        String from response, representing the location where the new user can be found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the service can't connect to keycloak
        UserAlreadyExistsException - if a user already exists
        CreateUserException - if keycloak can't create the given user
        UserNotFoundException - if the user could not be activated

      • readUserById

        public org.keycloak.representations.idm.UserRepresentation readUserById(java.lang.String id)
                                                                 throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Calls the user service to read a user by a given id
        Parameters:
        id - user to be read
        Returns:
        The UserRepresentation object
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if user can't be found
        java.io.IOException - if the service can't connect to keycloak

      • deleteUserById

        public void deleteUserById(java.lang.String id)
                    throws UserNotFoundException
        Calls the user service to delete a user by a given id
        Parameters:
        id - user to be deleted
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user can't be found

      • updateUserById

        public void updateUserById(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String jsonString)
                    throws UserNotFoundException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Calls the user service to update a user by given id and its representation
        Parameters:
        id - user to be updated
        jsonString - User representation
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user can't be found
        java.io.IOException - if the service can't connect to keycloak
